i1.name: Hextech Affinity
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Heimerdinger''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|20% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} while near an allied {{tip|turret}} or a {{ai|H-28G Evolution Turret|Heimerdinger}} or {{ai|H-28Q Apex Turret|Heimerdinger}} deployed by him.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate: Heimerdinger gains 20% bonus movement speed while near an allied turret or a H-28G Evolution Turret or H-28Q Apex Turret deployed by him.

q1.name: H-28G Evolution Turret
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Heimerdinger''' periodically [[stocks]] a ''Turret Kit'', up to a maximum of 3.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Heimerdinger''' deploys a ''H-28G Evolution Turret'' at the target location, which lasts until destroyed.
Up to 3 ''H-28G Evolution Turrets'' can be deployed at a time, and deploying a fourth destroys the oldest one.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Heimerdinger periodically stocks a Turret Kit, up to a maximum of 3.
Active: Heimerdinger deploys a H-28G Evolution Turret at the target location, which lasts until destroyed.
Up to 3 H-28G Evolution Turrets can be deployed at a time, and deploying a fourth destroys the oldest one.
q1.notes:
* Deals {{tip|spell damage}} on basic attacks and {{tip|area damage}} on the beam.
* ''H-28G Evolution Turret's'' stats are determined on cast, and do not update with ranking up the ability or gaining or losing AP or levels.
* The ''Turret Kit'' stockpile is displayed by a buff, represented as small metal nuts orbiting '''Heimerdinger'''.
* The ''Turret Kit'' buff will visually represent the recharge rate cooldown, and how many ''H-28G Evolution Turret's'' that '''Heimerdinger''' has stored. This is visible to both allies and enemies.
* The recharge rate of ''H-28G Evolution Turret'' is affected by [[ability haste]].
* The ''H-28G Evolution Turret'' has a {{tip|sight}} radius of {{tt|585|650*0.9}} while active and {{tt|{{fd|227.5}}|650*0.35}} while dormant.
** The -10% sight range modifier is applied only on the first stat update after the ''H-28G Evolution Turret'' is spawned, because of this it will have its full 650 sight range for up-to {{fd|0.25}} seconds upon being spawned.{{bug}}

q2.name: H-28Q Apex Turret
description: {{sbc|{{ai|UPGRADE!!!|Heimerdinger}} - Active:}} '''Heimerdinger''' deploys a ''H-28Q Apex Turret'' at the target location, which lasts for 8 seconds.
q2.descriptionHtml:
UPGRADE!!! - Active: Heimerdinger deploys a H-28Q Apex Turret at the target location, which lasts for 8 seconds.
H-28Q Apex Turret scales with UPGRADE!!!'s rank.
q2.notes:
* The ''H-28Q Apex Turret'' has a {{tip|sight}} radius of {{tt|900|1000*0.9}}.
** The -10% sight range modifier is applied only on the first stat update after the ''H-28Q Apex Turret'' is spawned, because of this it will have its full 1000 sight range for up-to {{fd|0.25}} seconds upon being spawned.{{bug}}
q2.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  0 as 0 and riot's value 20,20,20,20,20 as 20

w1.name: Hextech Micro-Rockets
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Heimerdinger''' unleashes a wave of 5 rockets that converge to the target location and fan beyond it up to a maximum range, with each rocket dealing {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy it hits. Every rocket hitting an enemy {{tip|champion}} grants 20% beam charge to all {{ai|H-28G Evolution Turret|Heimerdinger|icononly=yes}} {{ai|H-28Q Apex Turret|Heimerdinger|turrets}} within 1000 range, up to a maximum of 100% beam charge when hitting 5 rockets on an enemy champion.
Enemies can be hit by multiple rockets, with each one beyond the first dealing reduced damage, and {{tip|minion|minions}} taking increased additional damage.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Heimerdinger unleashes a wave of 5 rockets that converge to the target location and fan beyond it up to a maximum range, with each rocket dealing magic damage to the first enemy it hits. Every rocket hitting an enemy champion grants 20% beam charge to all H-28G Evolution Turret turrets within 1000 range, up to a maximum of 100% beam charge when hitting 5 rockets on an enemy champion.
Enemies can be hit by multiple rockets, with each one beyond the first dealing reduced damage, and minions taking increased additional damage.
leveling: {{st|Additional Damage|{{ap|{{#var:r1}}*0.2 to {{#var:r2}}*0.2}} {{as|(+ 12% AP)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|{{#var:r1}}*1.8 to {{#var:r2}}*1.8}} {{as|(+ 93% AP)}}}}{{st|Additional Minion Damage|{{ap|{{#var:r1}}*0.6 to {{#var:r2}}*0.6}} {{as|(+ 35.75% AP)}}|Total Minion Damage|{{ap|{{#var:r1}}*3.4 to {{#var:r2}}*3.4}} {{as|(+ 188% AP)}}}}
w1.notes:
* ''Hextech Micro-Rockets' '' direction-targeting allows for custom spread.
* ''Hextech Micro-Rockets'' will cast from wherever '''Heimerdinger''' is at the end of the cast time.

effects.str: • Initial Rocket Magic Damage: (+ 45% AP)

• Additional Damage: (+ 12% AP)
  • Total Damage: (+ 93% AP)
  • Additional Minion Damage: (+ 35.75% AP)
  • Total Minion Damage: (+ 188% AP)

w2.name: Hextech Rocket Swarm
description: {{sbc|{{ai|UPGRADE!!!|Heimerdinger}} - Active:}} '''Heimerdinger''' launches 4 waves of rockets in quick succession to the target location, each rocket dealing {{as|magic damage}}. Enemy {{tip|champions}} and {{tip|monsters}} are dealt reduced damage from rockets beyond the first, and further reduced beyond the fifth. {{tip|Minions}} take increased damage.
w2.descriptionHtml:
UPGRADE!!! - Active: Heimerdinger launches 4 waves of rockets in quick succession to the target location, each rocket dealing magic damage. Enemy champions and monsters are dealt reduced damage from rockets beyond the first, and further reduced beyond the fifth. Minions take increased damage.
Hextech Rocket Swarm scales with UPGRADE!!!'s rank.
leveling: {{st|Initial Rocket Magic Damage|{{ap|{{#var:ur1}} to {{#var:ur2}} 3}} {{as|(+ 45% AP)}}|2-5 Rocket Magic Damage|{{ap|32 to 58 3}} {{as|(+ 12% AP)}}|6-20 Rocket Magic Damage|{{ap|16 to 29 3}} {{as|(+ 6% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|{{#var:ur1}}+32*11.5 to {{#var:ur2}}+58*11.5 3}} {{as|(+ 183% AP)}}}}{{st|Total Minion Magic Damage|{{ap|{{#var:ur1}}*20 to {{#var:ur2}}*20 3}} {{as|(+ 900% AP)}}}}
w2.notes:
* ''Hextech Rocket Swarm's'' direction-targeting allows for custom spread.
* '''Heimerdinger''' can move once ''Hextech Rocket Swarm'' has been cast, even if the projectiles are still spawning or haven't even started to move yet.
* ''Hextech Micro-Rockets'' will cast from wherever '''Heimerdinger''' is at the end of the cast time.
w2.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  0 as 0 and riot's value 50,60,70,80,90 as 50/60/70/80/90

effects.str:
• Initial Rocket Magic Damage: (+ 45% AP)
  • 2-5 Rocket Magic Damage: (+ 12% AP)
  • 6-20 Rocket Magic Damage: (+ 6% AP)
  • Total Magic Damage: (+ 183% AP)
  • Total Minion Magic Damage: (+ 900% AP)

e1.name: CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Heimerdinger''' hurls a grenade at the target location, detonating upon impact to deal {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within the area and {{tip|slow}} them by 35% for 2 seconds. If the grenade hits an enemy {{tip|champion}}, all {{ai|H-28G Evolution Turret|Heimerdinger|icononly=yes}} {{ai|H-28Q Apex Turret|Heimerdinger|turrets}} within 1000 range of the impact gain 100% beam charge.
Enemies hit at the center of the grenade's impact are also {{tip|stun|stunned}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Heimerdinger hurls a grenade at the target location, detonating upon impact to deal magic damage to enemies within the area and slow them by 35% for 2 seconds. If the grenade hits an enemy champion, all H-28G Evolution Turret turrets within 1000 range of the impact gain 100% beam charge.
Enemies hit at the center of the grenade's impact are also stunned for 1.5 seconds.

e2.name: CH-3X Lightning Grenade
description: {{sbc|{{ai|UPGRADE!!!|Heimerdinger}} - Active:}} '''Heimerdinger''' hurls a massive grenade at the target location that bounces {{tt|a fixed distance|540 range}} 3 times, exploding each time at {{tt|twice the radius|420 explosion radius, 270 stun radius}}.
Enemy champions can only be damaged once per cast, but can be {{tip|slow|slowed}} and {{tip|stun|stunned}} multiple times if circumstances permit.
e2.descriptionHtml:
UPGRADE!!! - Active: Heimerdinger hurls a massive grenade at the target location that bounces a fixed distance 3 times, exploding each time at twice the radius.
Enemy champions can only be damaged once per cast, but can be slowed and stunned multiple times if circumstances permit.
CH-3X Lightning Grenade scales with UPGRADE!!!'s rank.
e2.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  0 as 0 and riot's value 85,85,85,85,85 as 85

r1.name: UPGRADE!!!
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Heimerdinger''' empowers his next basic [[Champion ability|ability]], placing it on the same {{sti|cooldown}} as its basic form, modifying its damage and making it {{tt|free to cast|Does not consume mana}}. ''UPGRADE!!!'' can be recast after 3 seconds while it is ready to empower.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Heimerdinger''' ends ''UPGRADE!!!'' and puts it on a 3-second cooldown.
''UPGRADE!!! can be used while affected by {{tip|cast-inhibiting crowd control}}.''
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Heimerdinger empowers his next basic Champion ability, placing it on the same cooldown as its basic form, modifying its damage and making it free to cast. UPGRADE!!! can be recast after 3 seconds while it is ready to empower.
Recast: Heimerdinger ends UPGRADE!!! and puts it on a 3-second cooldown.
UPGRADE!!! can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.
r1.notes:
*Toggle abilities do not count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
**Consuming the buff for an empowered basic [[Champion ability|ability]] does.
* No compensations for {{sti|{{as|mana}}}} are made if ''UPGRADE!!!'' is recast.
